Deep Ocean Exploration

Scroll or click to discover the mysteries of the ocean depths

Epipelagic Zone (0-200m)

The sunlit zone where most marine life thrives.

Atlantic Salmon

Found near the surface, known for its migratory journeys.

Mesopelagic Zone (200-1,000m)

The twilight zone with faint light and unique adaptations.

Firefly Squid

Emits bioluminescent light to navigate and hunt.

Bathypelagic Zone (1,000-4,000m)

Complete darkness, home to bizarre creatures.

Anglerfish

Uses a bioluminescent lure to attract prey.

Hadalpelagic Zone (6,000-11,000m)

The deepest trenches, like the Mariana Trench.

Snailfish

Survives extreme pressure at record depths.
